'''1.17.1 Release Candidate 2''' (known as '''1.17.1-rc2''' in the [[launcher]]) is the second and final release candidate for [[Java Edition 1.17.1]], released on July 5, 2021, which fixes some critical issues.<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-17-1-release-candidate-1|Minecraft 1.17.1 Release Candidate 2|July 5, 2021}}</ref>

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|fixedin=1.17.1 Release Candidate 2|otherissuescount=2}}
'''Private issues'''
* A private issue was fixed.
'''Other'''
* Fixed some critical issues.</onlyinclude>
